snippet: Ireland has accused Britain of torturing 14 Irish Republican Army suspects in Northern Ireland in 1971.
abstract: Ireland accuses Britain of torturing 14 Irish Republican Army suspects in Northern Ireland in 1971 and formally asks European Court of Human Rights to review its original findings in case; court ruled in 1978 that while British soldiers' interrogation tactics were inhumane, they fell short of torture.
lead_paragraph: Ireland has accused Britain of torturing 14 Irish Republican Army suspects in Northern Ireland in 1971.

headline.main: Ireland: Request to Review 1971 Torture Accusations
headline.print_headline: Ireland: Request to Review 1971 Torture Accusations
